import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import 'ad' const AddReview = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [rating, setRating] = useState('Rating'); const [reviewText, setReviewText] = useState(''); const handleSubmitReview = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); } return (
setName(e.target.value)} id='name' placeholder="name" type='text' className='form-control' />
) } export default AddReview
